Ok, got it mounted using poweriso, got it installed (I'm pretty sure), but when I try to start the game, it tells me I have the wrong disc inserted and to try again using the correct CD/DVD. Fix how?
Ok, got the file mounted via poweriso, got it installed (I'm pretty sure), tried to start the game and got a "Wrong disc inserted. Please insert the correct CD/DVD and retry." How do I fix this?

Did you crack it?

-> You have to open the image-file with a program called virtual clone drive. Get it here: http://www.chip.de/downloads/Virtual-CloneDrive_13012545.html 
After installation create one "virtual clone drive" . 
Now you can install NFS. Open the image by right-clicking it and say "load image" and select your virtual drive. Now you just have to install NFS by following the installation. After that you have to crack it by opening the image again using VCD and copy the content from the folder "crack" to your NFS main directory. (copy the data from inside the folder "CRACK" to: C:\programs/ElectronicArts/NeedForSpeedShift/ )

-while installation you may have to enter a serial. They are in a .txt-file.

Did you try Compatibility Mode with WinXp. Be sure you do.

Also check if you copied .bin data to NFS directory.

If problem is still there, check your .dll's at http://www.dll-files.com/dllindex/dll-files.shtml?d3dx9_41.

Hope i could help.

ACS.Enter

Thank you very much. Worked flawlessly. Great torrent, and I greatly recommend. I have been looking for a good NFS Shift torrent for the longest time.
